AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni scout
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a young scout, training to be a hunter for [PAWN_possessive] tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] works with the older hunters to learn the game paths and watering holes, and how to treat the scrapes and bruises that may happen along the way.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni kid wrestler
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was strong from the start, and could often be found wrestling and rough-housing with other youths.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni shaman apprentice
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into the shaman cast. [PAWN_pronoun] was raised to memorize the tribes lore and legends, and training in herbal and medical arts.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: curious Oni youth
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was always the curious one. Getting into things - making some small trouble for the tenders, but never anything malicious. This curiosity never faded, and grew into a thirst for all knowledge.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: little Oni digger
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was constantly playing in the mud or sand, [PAWN_pronoun] can often be found digging, burrowing and building. The others used to chuckle a bit, that [PAWN_pronoun] must be part mole.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni tribe child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Most of the Oni children lead a simple life, like [PAWN_nameDef]. They are looked after by their parents and tribal elders, occasionally lending a small hand here and there with the adults on simple chores.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni tribe child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Most of the Oni children lead a simple life, like [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] loved to run around everywhere in the settlement and being difficult to catch, sometimes to much of [PAWN_possessive] guardian's grief.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni tribe child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a large village. [PAWN_pronoun] had to learn to carry [PAWN_possessive] weight and help keep the tribe fed from an early age. With so many Oni in one village [PAWN_nameDef] became very engrossed in social activity.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni tribe child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in a large village where there was not enough to go around. [PAWN_pronoun] learned very quickly how to be resourceful with everything [PAWN_pronoun] can get.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: apprentice Oni builder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was curious about how [PAWN_possessive] hut was made. As such, [PAWN_pronoun] played more with building blocks at a young age and discovering how easily [PAWN_pronoun] made mistakes, and learned from it.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni minders
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised from young as an healer apprentice, refered as minders by the tribe.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: young animal caretaker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has been assisting with looking after the animals in the tribe at a young age, and has gotten use to handling them early on.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni crafter apprentice
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has always been making little things for [PAWN_possessive] family. Naturally, they encouraged [PAWN_possessive] skill, and is developing into quite the artisan.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni stickyfingers
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: If something was missing, it was probably [PAWN_nameDef]. Ever since [PAWN_pronoun] could crawl, [PAWN_pronoun] was getting into everything, and secreting things away in all kinds of little holes. A very sneaky and clever one here.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: clumsy Oni child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: At a young age, [PAWN_nameDef] struggled with doing just about anything because [PAWN_pronoun] kept carelessly shredding everything with [PAWN_possessive] sharp claws. [PAWN_nameDef] often needed more time to learn how to do things.
